data.name: About Love, Hate and the other ones
data.detailed_description:
About Love, Hate and the other ones is a puzzle game, in which you influence your surroundings by the force of Hate and the power of Love.

They shouldnʻt have pushed the button! Life on the hill was just perfect for Love and Hate before that shiny red device appeared. Suddenly, they are trapped in a dark and spooky cave, far away from home.

Now it is up to you to control the opposing forces of Love and Hate. They will soon meet a lot of Other Ones, wondering how they might react when Loved, or when Hated. Find a way through caves and ice, castles and factories, all by the might of your puzzling! If you ever return to that hill, life will be sweet again...

data.short_description: About Love, Hate and the other ones is a puzzle game, in which you influence your surroundings by the force of Hate and the power of Love. Find a way through caves and ice, castles and factories, all by the might of your puzzling!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“In conclusion, About Love, Hate and the Other Ones is one of the best puzzle games in the market...”
8.5 – Game Over

“A game about life, emotion, and cute creatures…”
4 of 5 – Gamezebo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Betriebssystem: Windows XP or newer, 32 or 64 bit
  • Prozessor: CPU with SSE2 support required (Core 2 Duo, Athlon X2 or newer).
  • Arbeitsspeicher: 1024 MB RAM
  • Grafik: OpenGL 2.1 compatible graphics card
  • Speicherplatz: 600 MB verfügbarer Speicherplatz
pc_requirements.recommended:
Empfohlen:
  • Betriebssystem: Windows 7
  • Prozessor: Core i3 or better
  • Arbeitsspeicher: 2048 MB RAM
  • Grafik: Nvidia GeForce or AMD Radeon recommended.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Betriebssystem: OS X 10.6 (Snow Leopard) or newer
  • Arbeitsspeicher: 2048 MB RAM
  • Speicherplatz: 600 MB verfügbarer Speicherplatz
mac_requirements.recommended:
Empfohlen:
  • Prozessor: Core i3 or better
  • Grafik: Nvidia GeForce or AMD Radeon recommended.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Betriebssystem: Linux 32 or 64bit kernel with GLIBC 2.14 or newer
  • Prozessor: CPU with SSE2 support required (Core 2 Duo, Athlon X2 or newer).
  • Arbeitsspeicher: 1024 MB RAM
  • Grafik: OpenGL 2.1 compatible graphics card
  • Speicherplatz: 600 MB verfügbarer Speicherplatz
  • Soundkarte: OpenAL compatible
  • Zusätzliche Anmerkungen: Requires SDL 2.0 or newer (comes with Steam) and OpenAL
linux_requirements.recommended:
Empfohlen:
  • Betriebssystem: Recent Debian, Ubuntu or Steam OS distro
  • Prozessor: Core i3 or better
  • Arbeitsspeicher: 2048 MB RAM
  • Grafik: Nvidia GeForce or AMD Radeon recommended.
